data.name: Can I Purchase vfx pack with my Mobile Phone?
data.value: Can I Purchase vfx pack with my Mobile Phone?

data.name: Do Overlays work with my Video Software?
data.value: Do Overlays work with my Video Software?

data.name: How do I Use the Overlays?
data.value: How do I Use the Overlays?

data.name: How do I Use the Sound Assets?
data.value: How do I Use the Sound Assets?

data.name: If you're working with Adobe Premier Pro, Final Cut Pro, Adobe After Effects, DaVinci Resolve, Sony Vegas Pro, or even mobile soft like Alight Motion, Kine Master, CapCut and other - overlays pack will work perfectly with your software.
data.value: If you're working with Adobe Premier Pro, Final Cut Pro, Adobe After Effects, DaVinci Resolve, Sony Vegas Pro, or even mobile soft like Alight Motion, Kine Master, CapCut and other - overlays pack will work perfectly with your software.

data.name: Of course. You can buy the product using your mobile phone or your tablet and download it later on your computer. We send a permanent link to your email address so you can download the product anytime. But remember that each package is designed to be used on a specific device. You won't be able to use the effects for a PC on a mobile phone or tablet.
data.value: Of course. You can buy the product using your mobile phone or your tablet and download it later on your computer. We send a permanent link to your email address so you can download the product anytime. But remember that each package is designed to be used on a specific device. You won't be able to use the effects for a PC on a mobile phone or tablet.

data.name: Overlays works with almost every video software available on the market. Our overlays are MOV and MP4 files compressed with a Prores codec, which makes them almost universally compatible. Keep in mind, that our pack is made to be used on a computer. But It is also designed to be used with your mobile phone or tablet.
data.value: Overlays works with almost every video software available on the market. Our overlays are MOV and MP4 files compressed with a Prores codec, which makes them almost universally compatible. Keep in mind, that our pack is made to be used on a computer. But It is also designed to be used with your mobile phone or tablet.

data.name: Processor: Intel Core i5/i7, Amd FX/Ryzen
data.value: Processor: Intel Core i5/i7, Amd FX/Ryzen

data.name: To get rid of the black background, simply change the blending mode of the selected overlay. Every video software has a blending mode option (the blending mode is basically how two layers are blended with each other). Use the Screen blending mode to get the best results.
data.value: To get rid of the black background, simply change the blending mode of the selected overlay. Every video software has a blending mode option (the blending mode is basically how two layers are blended with each other). Use the \"Screen\" blending mode to get the best results.

data.name: To use overlays, simply import them into your video software the same way you import any video footage. Then place the selected overlay above your shot in your timeline.
data.value: To use overlays, simply import them into your video software the same way you import any video footage. Then place the selected overlay above your shot in your timeline.

data.name: To use the sound assets, simply import the WAV or MP3 files into your editing software the same way you import any video/audio media. Then place the selected audio asset below your shot in your timeline in the dedicated audio track.
data.value: To use the sound assets, simply import the WAV or MP3 files into your editing software the same way you import any video/audio media. Then place the selected audio asset below your shot in your timeline in the dedicated audio track.

data.name: Video card: Nvidia or AMD with 4 GB of video memory.
data.value: Video card: Nvidia or AMD with 4 GB of video memory.

data.name: What hardware would be optimal for the job?
data.value: What hardware would be optimal for the job?
